description: The trial of the 2015 Charlie Hebdo attack is suspended after the main suspect catches the virus.
title: Charlie Hebdo trial suspended as suspect catches Covid-19
title_page: Charlie Hebdo trial suspended as suspect catches Covid-19 - BBC News
maintext: Fourteen people in total are on trial over the attack on the magazine, as well as related attacks on a police woman and Jewish supermarket that left 17 people dead in total over three days. Three of the 14 are being tried in absentia.
